Articles.Content:
I'd like to give points at the end of the mission for landing...  

I'm having trouble getting mission builder to differentiate between landing on the runway, or in the biome next to it.

Obviously, more points if you land on the runway.

My issue seems to be, if I test for landing in a biome, it also overrides the test to see if I landed on the runway.  So it scores both landings as if I missed the runway.
Support-type question moved to the support-type subforum.

7 minutes ago, Vanamonde said:

Support-type question moved to the support-type subforum. 

No one responds...  doesn't matter where you put it.

Was hoping there was a forum more specific to Mission Builder logic and so forth.  But I'm beginning to get the feeling there are very few who are interested.  Hence me poking around in the general forum just to see if anyone was out there that played with Mission Builder and would like to chat.
